oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-04-21 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from April 21, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Cowboy Copas (host/performer), guest performers the Louvin Brothers, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Johnny Toney (name unconfirmed), Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Grandpa Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Cowboy Copas; Rod Brasfield; Louvin Brothers
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Cowboy Copas -- Any Old Time (Cowboy Copas) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Cowboy Copas) -- Cowboy Copas introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Cowboy Copas) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Cowboy Copas) -- Cowboy Copas introduces the Louvin Brothers -- Hoping That You're Hoping (Louvin Brothers) -- Cowboy Copas introduces Johnny Toney [name unconfirmed] -- [Unidentified fiddle tune] (Johnny Toney [name unconfirmed] fiddle) -- Cowboy Copas talks -- When Jesus Beckons Me Home (Cowboy Copas) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grant Turner, Cowboy Copas) -- Prince Albert jingle (Cowboy Copas)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Hay, George D.
